```{r}
gspc <- read.csv('GSPC.csv')
gspc <- gspc$Close
returns<-diff(log(gspc))
# returns
```


```{r}
garchSpec <- ugarchspec(
  variance.model=list(model="sGARCH", garchOrder=c(1,1)),
  mean.model=list(armaOrder = c(0,0),include.mean=F))
fit = ugarchfit(spec = garchSpec, data = returns)
print(fit)
```
